mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, NOTICENO, NOTICETITLE, NOTICEDATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE IMPORTANCE = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICEDATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
select count(*) from notice where noticetitle like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from notice where noticecontent like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from notice where noticedate between #{begin} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rnum, noticeno, noticetitle, noticedate, noticewriter, noticecontent, original_filepath, rename_filepath, importance, imp_end_date, readcount from (select * from notice where noticetitle like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by importance desc, imp_end_date asc, noticeno desc) ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum, noticeno, noticetitle, noticedate, noticewriter, noticecontent, original_filepath, rename_filepath, importance, imp_end_date, readcount from (select * from notice where noticecontent like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by importance desc, imp_end_date asc, noticeno desc) ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into notice values ( (select max(noticeno) + 1 from notice), #{noticeTitle}, sysdate, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeContent}, #{originalFilePath}, #{renameFilePath}, #{importance}, #{impEndDate}, default)
mapper.update: update notice set readcount = readcount + 1 where noticeno = #{num}
